title: Diversity and inclusion: Stop talking and do your homework
summary: Mozilla's research uncovers important ways to promote diversity and inclusion in open source projects. (2017)

title: Open Source Survey
summary: The Open Source Survey is an open data project by GitHub and collaborators from academia, industry, and the broader open source community. (2017)

title: Charting Diversity
summary: Working together towards diversity in Wikipedia. (2014)

title: The Ethics of Unpaid Labor and the OSS Community
summary: Time commitment, pay inequality, and lack of access to jobs that encourage OSS during business hours. (2013)

title: HOWTO Encourage Women in Linux
summary: An effort to summarize the explanations, recommendations, and opinions of the women who already are interested and active in Linux. (2002)

title: FLOSS at Geek Feminism
summary: Wiki page with lots of resources on women in free & open source software. Highlights statistics, issues, and how to encourage women in FLOSS.
